data.eml:eml: A new species of Trechalea Thorell, 1869 (Araneae: Lycosoidea: Trechaleidae: Trechaleinae) from Costa Rica, with notes on its natural history and ecology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cruz, Estevam L., Silva, Da, Lapinski, Witold (2012): A new species of Trechalea Thorell, 1869 (Araneae: Lycosoidea: Trechaleidae: Trechaleinae) from Costa Rica, with notes on its natural history and ecology. Zootaxa 3563: 58-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210060
